title: How to Install a Drip Irrigation System

tasks.task: Converting a sprinkler system into a drip irrigation system
subtasks: Close off all sprinklers on the system by screwing caps onto the heads
Replace the sprinkler head closest to the garden bed with an adapter that connects to drip irrigation tubing
Install a backbone tubing system by rolling out half-inch tubing in a trench next to garden beds
Connect T-adapters and elbows to the backbone tubing to direct water to specific areas
Attach emitter tubing with spaced emitters to the backbone tubing, staggering the placement for even coverage
Pin tubes in place using ground staples to secure them along the garden beds
Install a filter and optional pressure regulator at the point where water enters the system
Flush the new tubing system with water to clear out any debris
Connect all parts of the system and turn on the water to ensure proper functioning of the drip irrigation setup
